name: Things With Which They're Associated Multiple Choice Quiz | People | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is associated with the 'Spruce Goose'?
questions.explanation:
Howard Hughes.

	It was an experimental plane flown by Hughes.

questions.text: What group is associated with the 'Speedwell'?
questions.explanation:
Pilgrims.

	It was a ship - along with the Mayflower - that was intended as transportation. But, it turned out to be unseaworthy.

questions.text: Who is associated with the 'Biograph Theatre'?
questions.explanation:
John Dillinger.

	The 'Lady in Red' sold him out, and he was ultimately killed by police agents after leaving the theatre.

questions.text: Who is associated with Menlo Park?
questions.explanation:
Thomas Edison.

	'The Wizard of Menlo Park', as he was called.

questions.text: Who is associated with Ford's Theatre?
questions.explanation:
Abraham Lincoln.

	Where Booth committed the crime of that century.

questions.text: With what is Richard Gatling associated?
questions.explanation:
Weaponry.

	The Gatling Gun. A formidable weapon.

questions.text: With what is the Texas Theatre associated?
questions.explanation:
Infamous Crime.

	The theatre where Oswald was apprehended.

questions.text: With which ship is Charles Darwin associated?
Charles Lindbergh is associated with what aircraft?
questions.explanation:
Spirit of St. Louis

	Across the Atlantic.
